review: I received this as a gift for Christmas. As the console is small and easy to operate there are quite a few flaws which leads me to returning it. The Netflix app is dated and I had issues with it working on a routine basis. There is no VUDU app. My family uses VUDU to digitally store and share our movies so this didn't make sense for us to continue to use. The HBO GO app will not work, as I'm not sure whether this is a Amazon or Comcast issue. Overall, it is a very nice piece of equipment; however, it did not fulfill ALL of our wants and we are returning this and getting a Roku3 instead.
